text.section: Effective July 1, 2003, no person shall represent himself or herself as an interpreter or engage in the practice of interpreting as defined in KRS 309.300 unless he or she is licensed in accordance with the provisions of KRS 309.300 to 309.319.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998.
